languages.text: {n}Глядя на блюстителя, склонившего голову, Мастер дисциплины цедит:{/n} "Не волнуйтесь, Лорд-капитан, к офицеру будут применены дисциплинарные меры после завершения расследования".

{n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."
languages.original_text: {n}Глядя на блюстителя, склонившего голову, Мастер дисциплины цедит:{/n} "Не волнуйтесь, Лорд-капитан, к офицеру будут применены дисциплинарные меры после завершения расследования".

traits.locale_text: {n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Officer Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

{n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Officer Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

{n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Officer Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

{n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

{n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

languages.text: {n}Klein baisse la tête d'un air contrit alors que Sauerback marmonne dans sa barbe, tout en le foudroyant du regard.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que le capitaine Klein fera l'objet de sanctions disciplinaires dès que notre enquête sera terminée. »
languages.original_text: {n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein baisse la tête d'un air contrit alors que Sauerback marmonne dans sa barbe, tout en le foudroyant du regard.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que l'officier Klein fera l'objet de sanctions disciplinaires dès que notre enquête sera terminée. »

languages.text: {n}Mientras Klein agacha la cabeza en gesto de culpabilidad, Sauerback murmura mientras le atraviesa con la mirada:{/n} «No se preocupe, Lord Capitán, tomaré medidas disciplinarias con el capitán Klein en cuanto concluya la investigación».
languages.original_text: {n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras Klein agacha la cabeza en gesto de culpabilidad, Sauerback murmura mientras le atraviesa con la mirada:{/n} «No se preocupe, Lord Capitán, tomaré medidas disciplinarias con el oficial Klein en cuanto concluya la investigación».

languages.text: {n}克莱因愧疚地低下了头。苏尔贝克嘟囔了些什么，目光简直要把他刺穿。{/n}“请放心，舰长大人，等调查完成之后，我们会对克莱因上尉采取惩处措施。”
languages.original_text: {n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因愧疚地低下了头。苏尔贝克嘟囔了些什么，目光简直要把他刺穿。{/n}“请放心，舰长大人，等调查完成之后，我们会对克莱因军官采取惩处措施。”

languages.text: {n}クラインが後ろめたそうに頭を下げると、ザウアーバックは視線をクラインに向けてこうつぶやいた。{/n}「安心してください、ロード・キャプテン。調査が終わり次第、クライン中隊長に懲戒処分が適用されます」
languages.original_text: {n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインが後ろめたそうに頭を下げると、ザウアーバックは視線をクラインに向けてこうつぶやいた。{/n}「安心してください、ロード・キャプテン。調査が終わり次第、クライン巡査に懲戒処分が適用されます」

languages.text: {n}Als Klein schuldbewusst den Kopf neigt, durchbohrt Sauerback ihn mit ihrem Blick und murmelt:{/n} "Seid versichert, Lord Captain, es werden Disziplinarmaßnahmen gegen Captain Klein ergriffen, sobald diese Ermittlungen abgeschlossen sind."
languages.original_text: {n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Klein schuldbewusst den Kopf neigt, durchbohrt Sauerback ihn mit ihrem Blick und murmelt:{/n} "Seid versichert, Lord Captain, es werden Disziplinarmaßnahmen gegen Offizier Klein ergriffen, sobald diese Ermittlungen abgeschlossen sind."

languages.text: {n}Klein suçluluk içinde başını eğerken Sauerback homurdanıyor. Bakışları, Klein'ı delip geçiyor.{/n} "İçiniz rahat olsun Lord Kaptan. Siz soruşturmayı bitirir bitirmez Komutan Klein, disiplin cezası alacak."
languages.original_text: {n}As Klein bows his head guiltily, Sauerback mutters, her gaze boring into him,{/n} "Rest assured, Lord Captain, disciplinary measures will be applied to Captain Klein as soon as we are done with the investigation."
